cgcloud__Asset_Audit__c.name: cgcloud__Asset_Audit__c
cgcloud__Asset_Audit__c.description: Represents the details of an asset survey.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

cgcloud__Account__c.description: Reference to the customer for whom the survey was conducted.

cgcloud__Asset__c.description: Reference to the asset for which the survey was conducted.

cgcloud__Condition__c.description: Specifies the status of the asset at the moment of the survey execution.

cgcloud__Distribution_Relevant__c.description: Indicates whether data correlated with the call needs to be distributed to mobility devices (true) or not (false).

cgcloud__Location_Rating__c.description: Specifies a rating for the determined location.

cgcloud__Location__c.description: Specifies the position of the asset with the customer.

cgcloud__Method__c.description: Specifies if the audit data record was initiated manually or via barcode scanner.

cgcloud__Record_Link__c.description: Link to the asset audit detail page.

cgcloud__Sighted__c.description: Indicates whether the asset is present (true) or not (false).

cgcloud__Usage__c.description: Specifies how the customer uses the asset.

cgcloud__User__c.description: Reference to the user who executed the survey.

cgcloud__Visit__c.description: Reference to the call on which the survey was conducted.
